config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is used to set the number of photons in the InstantGI constructor. It retrieves the value from the 'gi.igi.samples' key in the Options object passed to the constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration depends on how often the InstantGI constructor is called in the system. If the constructor is called frequently with different options, the configuration will be triggered accordingly.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration option is significant as it directly affects the number of photons used in the InstantGI calculations. Changing this value can impact the quality and performance of the global illumination in the system.
